snippet: The Mets said that they had signed the former Detroit Tigers closer Jose Valverde to a minor league contract, adding another veteran to their bullpen.
abstract: New York Mets sign former Detroit Tigers closer Jose Valverde to minor league contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Mets said that they had signed the former Detroit Tigers closer Jose Valverde to a minor league contract, adding another veteran to their bullpen.

headline.main: Mets Add Valverde to the Bullpen
headline.print_headline: Mets Add Valverde to the Bullpen
